definition: abbr. for 中國社會科學院|中国社会科学院[Zhong1 guo2 She4 hui4 Ke1 xue2 yuan4], Chinese Academy of Sciences (CAS)
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Then I talked with a doctor from a certain institute of Chinese Academy of Sciences.
sentences.chinese: 再一次是与中科院某研究所的博士生曹凯的对话。

sentences.english: But CAS did not disclose the total budget for the project.
sentences.chinese: 但是中科院没有披露该项目的总预算。

sentences.english: Mr. Sun Xianping, Research Fellow, Wuhan Institute of Physics and Mathematics, the Chinese Academy of Sciences.
sentences.chinese: 孙献平，研究员，中科院武汉物理与数学研究所。

sentences.english: Prof. Ya Cheng, Shanghai Institute of OpticsFine Mechanics, China.
sentences.chinese: 程亚教授，中科院上海光机所，中国。

sentences.english: He especially thanked the Chinese Academy of Sciences for allowing him to become an academician.
sentences.chinese: 他特别感谢中科院让他成为院士。

sentences.english: This work is supported by FDS Team, Institute of Plasma Physics, Chinese Academy of Sciences.
sentences.chinese: 本论文主要工作在中科院等离子体物理所进行。

sentences.english: Chunxian, a researcher at the Chinese Academy of Sciences.
sentences.chinese: 一位中科院的研究员开办了一所私人研究发展机构。

sentences.english: The academy also announced plans to attract more Chinese scientists back to their home country.
sentences.chinese: 中科院还宣布了吸引更多中国科学家回国工作的计划。

definition: State Key Laboratories (university laboratories in PRC supported by the central government)
pinyin: Guo2 jia1 Zhong4 dian3 Shi2 yan4 shi4

definition: Beijing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics
pinyin: Bei3 jing1 Hang2 kong1 Hang2 tian1 Da4 xue2

Ha1 er3 bin1 Gong1 ye4 Da4 xue2
